name: Men Shirt
description: Men Shirt Slim Fit Design Solid Color Long Sleeve Formal Casual Business Male Clothing
details: Slightly slim fit. Size up for a business look or work outfit. Also, it is a good investment for your warm or cold months wardrobe.

name: Men Pants
description: MEN'S TETON TWILL PANT RELAXED FIT | SLIM FIT
details: The khakis to covet. Angled hand pockets, hidden side-seam deep-drill hand pocket, diamond-shaped action gusset, triple-stitched seams, and “mud flap” reinforced heel cuffs make this a Mountain Khakis classic.

name: Satin dress
details: Get ready for the party season with this wrap dress. Featuring a burgundy satin fabric, wrap style to show off your killer curves and a flattering plunge neckline for the body confident. Team with hoops and strappy heels.

name: Sleeveless Blouse
details: Sleeveless Top In Light Stretchable Fabric Featuring Dramatic Turtleneck Design With Subtle Glitter For Extra Glam Factor.

name: Sun Hat
description:
A sun hat with a brim - perfect for protection from a number of
adverse weather conditions.
details: A sun hat with a brim - perfect for protection from a number of adverse weather conditions. DWR-treated and equipped with breathable mesh on the inside and an adjustable storm strap, making it cool, comfortable, practical and a new favourite travel companion. Designed with a graphic logo label at the front, for a distinctive look.

name: LEATHER HIGH-HEEL SHOES
details: PINK LEATHER HIGH-HEEL SHOES. ASYMMETRIC LEATHER UPPER. LINED STILETTO HEELS. POINTED TOES. AIRFIT®. FLEXIBLE TECHNICAL LATEX FOAM INSOLE, DESIGNED TO OFFER GREATER COMFORT. HEEL HEIGHT: 9.7 CM. / 3.8″

name: Mini Projector
details: Enjoy your private cinema at home Z6 Polar can project a 180-inch screen with full HD by using DLP optical projection technology of Texas instrument, which can easily provide you a prime viewing experience in the bedroom.

name: TP-LINK Tapo
description: TP-LINK Tapo C100 Home Security Wi-Fi Camera 1080P
details: TP-Link Tapo C100 is an affordable indoor Wi-Fi security camera that let you to monitor what is happening at your home when you are not around with the same Full HD 1080p camera.

name: Chocolate Cookies
description: Soft and chewy Chocolate Cookies loaded with three kinds of chocolate
details: There are three kinds of chocolate chips in cookies – milk chocolate, semi-sweet chocolate, and white chocolate.

name: Healthy Dark Chocolate
details: Most of our ingredients are low-carb (or keto) and gluten-free, but some are not.
